metadata.name: Renamed ProcDump Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of a renamed ProcDump executable. This often done by attackers or malware in order to evade defensive mechanisms.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (lower(process.file.name) = lower('procdump') OR (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -ma ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /ma ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –ma ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —ma ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―ma ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -mp ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /mp ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –mp ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —mp ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―mp '))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -accepteula')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /accepteula')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –accepteula')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —accepteula')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―accepteula')))) AND NOT (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\procdump.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\procdump64.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of a renamed ProcDump executable. This often done by attackers or malware in order to evade defensive mechanisms.

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. Procdump illegally bundled with legitimate software. 2. Administrators who rename binaries (should be investigated). Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sysinternals/downloads/procdump
